Job DescriptionWHAT YOULL DOBuild trusted partner relationships with senior client stakeholdersBe a thought-leader, evangelize and drive collaborative, value-centered approaches to defining and solving problemsAlign with Business teams and Senior Leadership to co-develop / support account plans and strategies for delivery, growth, and client satisfactionDrive revenue within the client / account portfolio by identifying opportunities, solutioning, launching, and orchestrating wide range of data & analytics engagementsServe as principal consultant leading complex transformational initiativesOwn and actively contribute to the strategic deliverables, such as vision & mission statements, assessment results, solution visions, strategies, plans & roadmapsSupport pre-sales activities by assessing digital opportunities, responding to RFPs, creating proposals and presentations, and helping to close / sign new dealsYour performance scorecard will include:Impact on Client Value and Business Growth achieve target revenue goalsImpact on Operating the Business achieve target billable utilizationImpact on Our People and Team(s) - contribute to the Data Practice people initiativesREQUIREMENTSExperience in IT or management consultingProven track record of launching and managing complex technology initiatives or large-scale programs (50+ people) working with senior business and IT stakeholdersDemonstrated success in developing and growing client relationshipsStrong problem solver and creative thinker with gravitasAbility to operate at the strategic level, yet being close enough to the details to add value to clients and be a real support to your teamExperience in end-to-end data and analytics project delivery (BigData, Cloud DWH, Advanced Analytics / MLOps, etc.)Awareness of cloud and data technologies and trends with practical experience with one or more major data and analytics technologiesAbility to manage customer expectations, present and explain solutions and project deliverables to senior stakeholdersAbility to lead teams while tackling high level of uncertainty, big number of stakeholders, and tight timelinesAbility to facilitate and drive strategy definitionAbility to challenge and influence data solution design and technology selection for enterprise data platforms, warehouses, data lakes, and data science platformsDesire to learn & expand your comfort zoneEntrepreneurial spiritExpertise/or prior background in media companiesExperience in media data analyticsNICE TO HAVEExperience building data and analytics organizations (center of excellence, data engineering pools, data science teams)Experience running on-site customer workshopsExperience in pre-sales activitiesQualificationsAbility to operate at the strategic level, yet being close enough to the details to add value to clients and be a real support to your teamExperience in end-to-end data and analytics project delivery (BigData, Cloud DWH, Advanced Analytics / MLOps, etc.)Awareness of cloud and data technologies and trends with practical experience with one or more major data and analytics technologiesAbility to manage customer expectations, present and explain solutions and project deliverables to senior stakeholdersAbility to lead teams while tackling high level of uncertainty, big number of stakeholders, and tight timelinesAbility to facilitate and drive strategy definitionWhy Is This a Great OpportunityUpward mobilityInnovative technologyExcellent comp packageSalary Type : Annual SalarySalary Min : 225000Salary Max : 265000Currency Type : US Dollars
